snippet: My mother is the stuff that dreams are made of, minus the homemade meatloaf and marble cake.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Jessica Soffer takes issue with popular notion that being mother is conflated with being good cook; notes that her mother is not much of a cook, but was and is an excellent mother.
lead_paragraph: My mother is the stuff that dreams are made of, minus the homemade meatloaf and marble cake.
